title: Studio Ceramic Vase Set
description: A set of three hand-thrown ceramic vases in graduated sizes. Each piece is unique — slight variations in glaze create depth and character. Sold as a set of three.
descriptionCn: 一套三件手工陶制花瓶，尺寸渐变。每件作品都是独一无二的——釉面的细微变化创造出深度和个性。套装三件出售。

seo.title: Studio Ceramic Vase Set — Julia Studio Shop
seo.description: Hand-thrown ceramic vase set, three graduated sizes. Each piece unique with subtle glaze variations.
